page.title: 20Health Services in Ferryhill
page.content: Ferryhill is the centre of a group practice consisting of 6 doctors.They cover an extensive area much wider than our grid.The surgery is in Ferryhill market place and opens twice daily during the week and for emergencies on Saturday morning.A nurse is on duty whenever the surgery is open.The District Nurses also operate from the surgery.Attached to the surgery is a dispensary.In the town there are also two dispensing chemists. There is a Family Health Clinic run by South-West Durham Health Authority. This deals with child welfare,family planning,chiropody,speech and hearing. Ferryhill has a dental practice with 3 dentists.There is also an opticians practice. The nearest hospital is at Bishop Auckland 6 miles away.
